meanings.definition: Physically and mentally dependent on a particular substance
meanings.sent1: She felt sick when she didn't have her favorite candy, showing she was addicted to it.
meanings.sent2: He was so addicted to video games that he played for hours every day.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed addicted to chasing shadows, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her addiction to reading was like a magnet, pulling her in every time.
meanings.sent5: His addiction to exercise was as strong as a giant's grip.

meanings.definition: Enthusiastically devoted to a particular activity or thing
meanings.sent1: The team was addicted to winning, always giving their best.
meanings.sent2: She was addicted to painting, spending hours creating beautiful artwork.
meanings.sent3: His addiction to singing made him the star of every party.
meanings.sent4: Their addiction to adventure was like a flame, always burning bright.
meanings.sent5: The child's addiction to playing outside was as clear as the blue sky.
